title: After Loss In World Boxing Semis, Mary Kom Openly Questions Decision & Fans Certainly Agree!
text:
Mary Kom (51kg) settled for a bronze in the World Championships after losing to Busenaz Cakiroglu in the semis.

She lost 1-4.

The Indian contingent sought a review of the decision but the appeal was turned down.

afp

"How and why. Let the world know how much right and wrong the decision is," she tweeted.

How and why. Let the world know how much right and wrong the decision is....https://t.co/rtgB1f6PZy. @KirenRijiju @PMOIndia — Mary Kom (@MangteC) October 12, 2019

Both were initially defensive but Carkiroglu eventually went on the attack to gain the upper advantage.

twitter

This is her first world medal in the 51kg category.

Mary has also won an Olympic bronze medal (2012), five Asian titles along with gold medals at the Asian and Commonwealth Games.

afp

Don't Miss 30.3 K SHARES 17 K SHARES 8 K SHARES 8.1 K SHARES

Fans agreed with her and here's what they had to say:

I am absolutely fed up with this new system of boxing,AIBA has now become the laughing stock in the world of sports.Are these judges pre-planned before each bout?? — Athul George (@athulrg) October 12, 2019

Whatever be the result you are our champion. Keeping your fighting spirit on even at this age itself is amazing. True champion.👍 — Sreeraj Mohandas (@SreerajMohandas) October 12, 2019

The IOC has already thrown away @AIBA_Boxing from the Olympics keeping in mind their flawless streak of integrity,do I need to say more. — J D (@johnd290) October 12, 2019

Shame on @AIBA_Boxing 👎.Pathetic Decision. — Dr Dheeraj Prajapati MBBS Aiims 🇮🇳 (@DrDheerajPraja7) October 12, 2019

Worst decision 😒 — Jeyasurya (@jeyasuryajss) October 12, 2019

We KNOW Everything, Mary....But THAT Hardly matters to us, dear....We are PROUD of you...WERE & WILL BE..BELIEVE us or we will DO a Hanumaan act for You..दिल चीर के..🌹🌷..Don't be upset.👏👏✌✌..Be HAPPY and Stay BLESSED.👍👍😊🙂...my Best Wishes...🇮🇳🇮🇳जय हिन्द 🇮🇳🇮🇳 — Jayant Kumar Ghosh (@Jayantghosh20) October 12, 2019

It's clearly shows that you are the Champion — Shyam Gupta (@Shyamgupta8400) October 12, 2019

Mam you are our pride. No matter what we are always with you. Love and respect 🙏🇮🇳👏👏👏 — Dharmveer Pratap Singh 🇮🇳 (@Awarabairagi) October 12, 2019

Mary had a shot at a 7th title and she will be tore up about missing out. But 8 medals is no mean feat at the top level and she has every reason to be proud.

With Inputs From PTI.
